channel.title: Fan-Made Content for Shadow of the Demon Lord

item.title: Crasmere, the Village in Shadow
item.description:
Crasmere, the Village in Shadow

A few weeks ago, someone over on the Google+ Community asked for more novice adventures, so I decided to see if I could make one. Seeing as how on I recently talked about the 3-act story structure on my podcast, I decided to make an adventure using said structure.
